Ideological clash between the two characters is central.

location.primaryLocation: MT. BASHENGA - TOP OF THE HILL

continuityNotes: Nakia is recovering from her fight with Killmonger.
The women rejoin the main battle.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. SHURI'S LAB - COCKPIT - DAY

specialEffects.description: Green screen/LED view of canyon chase.

continuityNotes: Cuts back and forth with the exterior dogfight.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. WAKANDAN CANYON

specialEffects.description: Full CG aerial dogfight in a canyon, with sonic blasts and rock outcroppings.

specialConsiderations: Fully CG sequence.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. SHURI'S LAB - WAKANDA DESIGN GROUP

specialEffects.description: Building shaking.
Hologram deactivating. Dragonflyer firing sonic blasts outside window.

setConstruction: Lab set on a motion base/shaker rig

specialConsiderations: Combines practical set shaking with complex VFX through the window.
continuityNotes: The lab itself is now under direct attack.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. MT. BASHENGA - TOP OF THE HILL - DAY

location.primaryLocation: MT. BASHENGA - TOP OF THE HILL

specialEffects.description: VFX for sonic shields breaking.
Jabari warriors breaking through the Border Tribe phalanx. M'Baku leading the charge. Okoye, Shuri, Nakia lead counter-charge.

specialConsiderations: The turning point of the battle with the arrival of the Jabari.
Requires a huge number of stunt performers and extras from two different tribes.
continuityNotes: The tide of the battle shifts in favor of the heroes.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. VIBRANIUM MINE BOTTOM - DAY

specialEffects.description: Brawl, headbutt, knocked back by train.

continuityNotes: Killmonger retrieves a blade, re-escalating the fight.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. WAKANDAN AIRSPACE - DAY

specialEffects.description: Full CG sequence: dogfight, RTF shot down, drills attaching, sonic overload explosion.

specialConsiderations: Fully CG sequence combined with Ross's cockpit performance.
The 'Wakanda Forever' arm cross gesture is used as a weapon trigger.
continuityNotes: The RTF is now critically damaged and trapped.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. WAKANDAN AIRSPACE - DAY

specialEffects.description: Sonic energy explosion from RTF, destroying cables and dragonflyers. RTF falls from sky, then reboots and stabilizes.

specialConsiderations: Fully CG sequence.
continuityNotes: The escort dragonflyers are destroyed. The RTF is rebooted.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. WAKANDAN BORDER REGION - DAY

specialEffects.description: RTF stops on a dime, hovering. Sonic emission cracks the ground with a cymatic signature.

specialConsiderations: Fully CG sequence.
continuityNotes: The RTF has recovered and is back in the fight.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. SHURI'S LAB - COCKPIT - DAY
EXT. WAKANDAN AIRSPACE - DAY

specialEffects.description: Cargo ship activates cloaking technology. RTF collides with it, causing a massive explosion and deactivating the cloak.

specialConsiderations: Fully CG sequence for the climax of the aerial battle.
continuityNotes: The final cargo ship is destroyed.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. SHURI'S LAB - COCKPIT - DAY

specialEffects.description: Cockpit simulator disintegrates into sand.
Glass window blows out.
safetyRequirements: Safety gear for actor and crew

specialConsiderations: Coordination of VFX cockpit disintegration with practical glass explosion.
continuityNotes: The lab is now damaged with a blown-out window.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. MT. BASHENGA - TOP OF THE HILL - DAY

location.primaryLocation: MT. BASHENGA - TOP OF THE HILL

animals.trainingLevel: VFX / Trained animal for close-up lick

specialEffects.description: Okoye stands down a charging rhino. W'Kabi surrenders.
safetyRequirements: Composite shot of actress and rhino

specialEffects.description: VFX rhino charge and stop.

specialConsiderations: Complex interaction between an actress and an animal/VFX animal.
Resolution of the main surface battle.
continuityNotes: The Border Tribe has surrendered.
W'Kabi has been defeated.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. VIBRANIUM MINE BOTTOM - DAY

specialEffects.description: Suits retracting and re-forming.
Final fight sequence, arm bar takedown, catching spear, and stabbing Killmonger.

specialEffectsMakeup: Fatal stab wound in Killmonger's chest
prosthetics: Prosthetic chest piece for stabbing rig and blood effect

specialtyItems: Killmonger Panther suit with rig for stab wound

specialConsiderations: Climax of the main duel, involving the death of the antagonist.
Requires seamless integration of stunts, VFX, and SFX makeup.
continuityNotes: Killmonger is fatally wounded.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. VIBRANIUM MINE ELEVATOR - DAY
continuityNotes: The spear blade is still in Killmonger's chest.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. MT. BASHENGA - SUNSET

location.primaryLocation: MT. BASHENGA - TOP OF THE HILL

specialEffects.description: Killmonger pulls the blade out of his own chest.

specialEffectsMakeup: Killmonger's fatal chest wound, heavy blood flow upon removal

specialConsiderations: Emotionally significant death scene.
Shooting at sunset ('magic hour') requires precise timing and efficiency.
continuityNotes: Killmonger dies.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. TRIBAL COUNCIL ROOM - DAY

specialtyItems: Full royal regalia for T'Challa and family
Full costumes for all council members and M'Baku

specialConsiderations: Denouement scene showing the restored and united council.
continuityNotes: M'Baku is now present at the council, signifying a new alliance.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. STEP TOWN - GOLDEN CITY - MORNING
specialConsiderations: Romantic resolution scene.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. LAKE MERRITT APARTMENT COMPLEX - OAKLAND - DAY

specialRequirements: VFX for uncloaking; possibly a practical set piece

specialEffects.description: RTF uncloaking.

specialtyItems: Subtle, modern clothing for T'Challa and Shuri

setDecoration: Run-down apartment building exterior and basketball court

specialConsiderations: Requires location shooting in an urban environment.
Features a major VFX reveal.
Working with multiple child actors.
continuityNotes: This is the same location from Killmonger's childhood flashbacks.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. UNITED NATIONS ASSEMBLY BUILDING - ROTUNDA - DAY
INT. UNITED NATIONS ASSEMBLY BUILDING - DAY
specialConsiderations: Mid-credits scene.
Requires a large number of background actors representing diverse nationalities.
continuityNotes: Wakanda reveals its true nature to the world.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: INT. WAKANDAN MEDICINE HUT - DAY
specialConsiderations: Post-credits scene setup.

detailedSceneBreakdowns.sceneHeader: EXT. WAKANDAN MEDICINE HUT - CONTINUOUS
specialConsiderations: Post-credits scene revealing Bucky's status.
Requires a beautiful, serene lakeside location.
continuityNotes: Bucky is missing his metal arm.

makeup: Multiple complex wound prosthetics (gunshots, stabs, slashes)
Large crowd scenes requiring diverse tribal makeup
wardrobe: Multiple hero suits (Panther, Killmonger) with stunt and VFX variations
Extensive and detailed costumes for multiple Wakandan tribes (Council, Border, Dora, Jabari)
Large number of costumes for crowd/battle scenes
artDepartment: Multiple large, complex set builds (Shuri's Lab, Tribal Council, Warrior Falls, Mine)
Breakaway walls, glass, and props for destruction sequences
Extensive snow/weather effects for Jabari scenes
Fire effects for herb garden burning
specialEffects: Major battle sequence with hundreds of extras, stunts, and overlapping effects
Multiple large explosions (wall breach, RPG, aircraft)
Extensive wire work for stunts (blasts, jumps, falls)
High-speed vehicle and aircraft sequences (practical and VFX)
